entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as being in trouble with the school governors.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She reacts to Hagrid's situation by gasping that he hasn't been fired yet.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He asks how Malfoy is after being injured.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as faking an injury to get attention.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is the Hogwarts nurse. She is mentioned as being able to mend injuries, including regrowing half of Harry's bones last year.

entities.name: school governors
entities.description: The school governors are in charge of making decisions about the school. They are mentioned as having been told about Hagrid's situation.

relationships.description: Hagrid is in trouble with the school governors, who think he started too big and should have left.
Malfoy was treated by Madam Pomfrey after being injured.
Hermione supports Hagrid, reacting to his situation with concern.
Ron is concerned about Malfoy's injury and asks how he is.
